data.description: Hashes as objects, including set methods
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module allows you to manipulate hashes as objects, calling
    methods on those objects. It also includes various set methods, both
    using method names or overloaded operators, using key-value pairs
    together as a single item. Lastly, it uses the Want.pm module so
    that proper method chaining can be used.

    The name Set::Hash was chosen because it acts as both an Hash and a
    Set.
